name: Tofu & Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Vegan high-protein Asian-style dish. Tofu and colorful vegetables.

instructions.instruction: Wrap tofu in clean towel or paper towels and press for 15 minutes.
instructions.tip: Place something heavy on top to squeeze out water.

instructions.instruction: Heat vegetable oil in wok over high heat.
Fry tofu cubes until golden on all sides, 5-6 minutes.
Remove tofu. Stir-fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 30 seconds.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil.
Sprinkle sesame seeds, serve over brown rice.

tips: Tofu is a complete protein source - contains all 9 essential amino acids.
Don't skip pressing step - essential for crispiness.
Ideal protein source for vegan athletes.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for up to 3 days. Crispiness may decrease.
servingSuggestion: Serve over brown rice or noodles.
